name: elfishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or is like an elf (= an imaginary magical being in stories, often like a small person with pointed ears): She looked up and grinned elfishly at us. He was dressed in a black cloak and elfishly pointed black shoes. Synonym
elvishlyRelated word
elfish
More examplesFewer examplesThe houses were elfishly small, and so were the people who lived in them.Her large, innocent eyes looked elfishly merry.He looked at us elfishly through his thick black curls.His eyes twinkled more elfishly than ever when I showed him what I had found.She got up and pranced elfishly to the kitchen.
